item.title: MIUI OS1.0.14.0.UMVCNXM Fastboot update for MIX Fold 3 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: MIX Fold 3 China

Codename: babylon

Version: OS1.0.14.0.UMVCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.8 GB

MD5: 0b00d680f682a25fbfab4fbdd00557da

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Always-on display]
Fix: Crashes occurred in some cases
[More features and improvements]
Fix: Scrolling screenshots were solid black if taken while searching for items

Download: Here
